overview: Famed Palm Beach Art Critic "Indio." Travels around the United States and Mexico showcasing some of the most shocking and disturbing art forms ever captured on Super 8 film. Assault Rifle Artist, Nudist Colony Body Painting, Abstract Suicide Artist, Insane Asylum Masterpieces, and a live body piercing on stage performance by "Genitortures" are just a few of the bizarre chapters in this twisted retro "Grindhouse" 1960's style "Shockumentary."
title: Mondo Art
